it.polimi.se2018

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes Cell behavior. A cell can be created with or without color and/or value restrictions. A die can be associated with a cell, removed from it or switched with another die.
    Author:
    Alessio Molinari

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cell(COLOR colorConstraint, int index)
      Constructor: generates a cell with color constraint
      Cell(COLOR colorConstraint, int valueConstraint, int index)
      Constructor: generates a cell with color and value constraints
      Cell(int index)
      Constructor: generates a cell with no constraints
      Cell(int valueConstraint, int index)
      Constructor: generates a cell with value constraint

        public Die switchDie(Die toSwitchDie)
              throws EmptyCellException
        Switches the cell's associated die with another one You cannot switch a die with an empty cell
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        old cell's associated die
        Throws:
